Orlando,  ha trabajado duro para mantener a su familia con lo necesario; se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas desde hace 7 años, este oficio lo aprendió cuando ayudaba a su tío a realizar este trabajo; pero además de eso también se dedica a la agricultura y el lugar donde cultiva está a 9 kilómetros de su casa.

Orlando, necesitando el préstamo para comprar equipo eléctrico para fortalecer su negocio y realizar más rápido y eficaz su trabajo. 

Su mayor sueño es brindar un servicio completo atravesó de su negocio y sacar adelante a su hijo con el estudio para que se pueda desarrollar en el ámbito profesional y laboral.
texts.en:
Orlando, 25, is an electrician. He attended school until the ninth grade. His partner sells cakes out of their home, they have one child.

Orlando has worked hard to provide for his family; for the past seven years he has made metal structures, a trade he learned from his uncle when he helped him with his work. Aside from that he also works in agriculture, the plot he grows on is nine kilometers from his home.
Orlando needs this loan to purchase electrical equipment to improve his business and perform his work more quickly and efficiently.
His greatest dream is to provide a complete service through his business, and help his son succeed in school so he can do well as a professional in the labor market.

loans.use: to purchase electronic equipment to improve his business and perform his work more quickly and efficiently.

loans.name: Eti. B

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients. Eti. B is a 48-year-old married housewife. Her husband has been a worker for five years. Eti. B and her family do not have enough income to build a toilet or have a clean water source at their home.

Eti. B is requesting a 6,700,000 IDR loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah to build a sanitation system at her home to have a toilet and clear water for her family.  She will be able to repay her loan. Eti. B and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for this opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: to build a sanitation system at her home to have a toilet and clear water for her family

loans.name: Gloria

texts.pt: A senhora Gloria é casada mãe de um filho. É docente e passa a maior parte do tempo longe da familia, uma vez que trabalha num distrito longincuo, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar materiais de construção tais como, cimento, pedra e areia. Tem sonho de fazer o ensino superior e melhorar o nivel de vida. Tem como maior desafio, manter as fontes de financiamento e ingressar na universidade
texts.en: Gloria is married and mother of one son.  She is a teacher and  passes most of her time far away from her family since she works in a distant district. With this loan she plans to purchase construction materials such as cement, stones and sand.  Her dream is to complete her higher education and improve her standard of living.  Her greatest challenge is to maintain her funding sources and enroll in the university.

loans.use: to purchase cement, stones, and sand.

loans.name: Marta Liliam

texts.es: Doña Marta de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella posee una funeraria desde hace 14 años, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de recidencia en un zona uy transitada con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas cajas funebres para continuar con su negocio y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Marta is 53 years old and owns the home where she lives with her life partner and their two children.  She has owned a funeral home for more than 14 years.  Her business is located near a residential area and in a very busy zone.  Income from her work pays for household expenses.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more coffins in order to continue with her business and have a higher income.

loans.use: purchase more coffins.

loans.name: Ana Beatriz

texts.es: Ana es una empresaria independiente de 55 años de edad, habitante de Nemocón un municipio de Cundinamarca cuyo nombre significa “Lamento de guerrero”, atribuido a su historia de la que los zipas hace parte y era su sitio de reunión, donde deploraban con llanto y gritos la derrota o la muerte de sus jefes, en este mismo lugar, Ana tiene una parcela de vaca lecheras que abastecen de este producto a recolectoras de leche y a sus vecinos.  Ella aprovecho la riqueza de su región y su tradición familiar para dedicarse a la recolección de leche en compañía de su cónyuge, diariamente la producción de leche que sus vacas le generan es suministrada a sus clientes y para ampliar la capacidad de su negocio necesita comprar más ganado es por ello que está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de vacas  y así su negocio será cada vez más próspero.  Ana es madre de cuatro hijos a quienes desea dejarles por herencia su predio y esta actividad, es por ello que desea ampliarlo y mejorarlo cada día.
texts.en:
Ana is an independent businesswoman aged 55. She lives in Nemocón, a town in Cundinamarca, whose name means "The Cry of the Warrior", attributed to its history involving the tribe of the Zipas, as it was where they would gather to mourn with cries and shouts the defeat or death of their leaders.

Ana has a plot of dairy cows which supply milk to milk collectors and to her neighbors. She took advantage of the richness of the region, and the family tradition of milk collection. Together with her partner, the milk produced by the cows each day is delivered to the customers.

To increase the capacity of the business, she needs to buy more cattle. This is why she is requesting her first Kiva loan, through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy cows, making her business more and more prosperous.

Ana is a mother to four children, to whom she wishes to leave as an inheritance her land and this business, which is why she wishes to expand and improve it every day.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 38 years old and married with five children. She is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her family. For the past five years, Maria’s husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market. He is responsible for fulfilling the financial needs of the entire family. Due to financial constraints, her husband is not able to buy different types of tailoring accessories, such as pieces of cloth, lace, needles, and sewing machine parts.

Marie is requesting a Kiva loan through the field partner BRAC Pakistan to assist her husband to purchase needed materials to fulfill his business needs and earn more profit. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her husband's tailoring business

loans.name: Clara Francisca

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo  se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Clara, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 22, 21 y 14 años  de edad, todos aun viven con ella y el menor estudia en colegio.  El esposo se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Clara es una mujer que le gusta trabajar y así ganarse sus propios ingresos para salir adelante, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo,  zapatos, y productos Yanbal  (perfumes, cremas, bisutería, etc.), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa, ella  deja sus productos a  crédito y cobra cada semana, lleva más de 20 años dedicada a esta actividad  razón por lo cual ya cuenta con muy buena clientela que siempre le piden sus productos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos,  perfumes, cremas, bisuterías y todo lo que ella vende. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: The San Mateo Credit Group meets fortnightly in the beautiful coastal town of San Mateo near the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches which are very popular all year round with tourists from at home and abroad. Most of the locals work in fishing or other sea-related jobs. The town is home to 46-year-old Clara, who is married with three children of 22, 21 and 14. They still all live with her and the youngest is still at school. Her husband is a fisherman. Clara enjoys being able to work and earn her own income to help her get by. She sells clothing of all kinds, shoes, and Yanbal products (perfume, creams, jewellery. etc. She does this door-to-door and also from her home. She leaves her goods on credit and collects payments weekly. She has been doing this kind of work for over 20 years and, consequently, has built up a good clientele who always order her products. She will use this loan to buy clothing, shoes, perfume, creams and jewellery and everything else she sells. She has been a member of the Credit Group since it was founded and she likes it because it is very close-knit. Her dream is to do her best for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, perfume, creams, jewellery, etc.

loans.name: Mak

texts.en:
Mak is 46 years old and married with four children who are all in school. She is originally from Kampong Speu province. Mak is a rice farmer and her husband builds pillars to sell to earn more income. She and her husband have been involved in these businesses for 28 years and they earn about 13 USD per day and are able to save about 3 USD daily for future needs. Mak’s business challenges include low farm outputs due to insufficient water and the threat of pests. 

Mak is requesting a loan to pay tuition fees for her daughter. This will be her first loan with VisionFund. Mak hopes that she can pay her school fees on time and that her daughter will be able to study until she graduates from university.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her daughter

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Ou Dong District

loans.name: Paula Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Paula, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 20, 16 y 11 años  de edad, todos aun viven con ella y los dos  menores estudia en colegio y escuela.  El esposo se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Paula es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y la educación de sus hijos, se dedica a la venta de sabanas, toallas, toldos y otros artículos de bazar, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja casi todos los días, aprovecha las horas de la mañana ya que a esa hora es más fresco y sale con más facilidad, aunque si sus clientes desean algo de lo que ella les vende la visitan en su hogar lugar en cual tiene unas vitrinas, tiene mucha clientela ya que les da buenas  ventajas como darles a crédito y cobrar cada 8 o 15 días. Lleva más de 10 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse sus propios recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar sabanas, toallas, cosas para regalos, entre otras cosas que vende. Lleva más de 9 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos y su  familia.
texts.en:
The lending group San Mateo meets every 15 days at the beautiful San Mateo beach in the city of Manta. Manta is well known for its beautiful beaches which are visited at all times of year by both national and foreign tourists. Most inhabitants of this area work in fishing or other work related to the sea.

Paula lives here. She is 36 years old and married. From this relationship she has three children, ages 20, 16 and 11. All of them live with her and the younger two attend school. Her husband is a fisherman.

Paula is a housewife but in order to earn her own money and help her husband with household expenses and the education for their children, she sells sheets, towels, shades, and other merchandise door to door. She works almost every day and takes advantage of the morning hours when it is cooler and easier to go out. However, if her clients want something that she is selling they visit her in her home where she has display cases set up. She has many customers since she offers advantages such as providing credit and collecting payment every 8 or 15 days. She has had her business for more than 10 years and it enables her to have her own resources.

This loan is to purchase sheets, towels, and gift items, among other things she sells. She has been in the lending group for more than 9 years and she likes it because thanks to the loans she is able to fund her business. Her dreams are to provide the best for her children and her family.

loans.use: to purchase sheets, towels, gift items, etc.

loans.name: Oksana

texts.en:
Oksana is married. She is a hardworking and active person. She has her own business selling women's clothes, which she has been doing for two years. She rents a retail spot at the central market. Oksana's mother has a similar business and she shares her experience with Oksana.

Oksana is requesting a loan for 20,000 UAH, which she will use to purchase women's clothes for the winter season. The loan will help her to increase the assortment of goods and attract more clients.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothes for winter season

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman. She has six children. She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, bread, toothpaste, soap, rice, and flour. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a busy area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital.

Janet will use the Kes 70,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items. Her business goal is to have a supermarket within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items.

loans.name: Dorcas Group

texts.en:
The seven ladies in the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Dorcas” live in the town of Santo Domingo Xenacoj in the Department of Sacatepequez, Guatemala. It is located 45 minutes outside of the capital, Guatemala City. The ladies range in age from 20 to 52 and the majority of them are married with children. As is the case with the overwhelming majority of indigenous women in Guatemala, they were unable to complete their education and the ladies of “Dorcas” attended elementary school only. The women have various small businesses including small convenience stores, tortilla shops, small mills and assembly workshops, a laundry business as well as handicrafts.

The President of the Trust Bank is 52 year old Berta who has been separated from her husband for 15 years. She takes care of her four children alone. In order to meet the expenses of her family, Berta has a “tortilleria” or tortilla shop as well as a mill to grind corn. She is requesting a loan to buy a electric motor for her mill that will enable her to be much more efficient and increase production. 

Berta was only able to attend school through the second grade. During the few years that she has secured loans from Friendship Bridge, she has been greatly inspired by the monthly educational trainings that have given her a lot of information and new ideas.

The women of the “Dorcas” are very excited to be participating in their Trust Bank and already can see a brighter future for themselves, their families and their community in Santo Domingo Xenaoj, Guatemala. Thank you, KIVA investors!

loans.use: to buy a electric motor for the mill used to grind corn for the tortillas she makes. It will be much more efficient and increase production.

loans.name: Angie

texts.en:
Angie is 35 years old and has six children. Angie is married and has five children who are in school.

Angie is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Angie requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Angie has been raising pigs for three years now and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Angie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Omar Giovanni

texts.es: Gabriel es un microempresario de 38 años que gracias a la experiencia que logró adquirir en la panadería de sus padres, implementó su propia cafetería en la que ofrece bebidas calientes aprovechando la demanda que estas tienen en Madrid un municipio de Cundinamarca en donde el clima es templado y sus habitantes consumen bebidas aromáticas, tintos, capuchinos y todo tipo de bebidas.  En la actualidad cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en su negocio que apertura a las 9 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m. y es el encargado de la preparación de las bebidas a las cuales les imprime su toque personal.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en materias primas para la preparación de sus bebidas con lo  que garantiza un fluido inventario sin contratiempos.   Su meta a futuro es remodelar la fachada del negocio y convertirlo en un salón. Su meta personal es crecer en su negocio y como comerciante.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a micro-businessman who, thanks to the experience he obtained at his parents' bakery, set up his own cafeteria offering hot drinks, making the most of the demand for these in Madrid, a town in Cundinamarca where to climate is temperate and the inhabitants enjoy aromatic drinks, black coffee, cappuccinos and many other types of drinks.

He currently has 10 years' experience in this business, which opens at 9 am until 9 pm, and he is responsible for making the drinks, to which he always imparts his own personal touch.

He is now applying for her first loan with Kiva, through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy raw ingredients to make the drinks with which he will be able to guarantee a seamless inventory without setbacks.

His goal for the future is the remodel the facade of his business, and convert it into a lounge. His personal goal is to grow as a businessman.

loans.use: to invest in raw ingredients to make his drinks

loans.name: Grupo Suqun Group

texts.es: Sebastiana ( la primera del lado derecho de la fotografía) es una mujer digna de admirar pues se esfuerza mucho para que su familia tenga lo necesario, ella tiene  ahora la satisfacción de haber logrado que su casa se encuentre en mejores condiciones y esto lo logro con el apoyo del préstamo pues sin esta ayuda su casa estaría en las mismas condiciones, por lo  que agradece profundamente a los inversionistas de kiva por su buena voluntad de cambiar vidas,pero sin embargo Sebastiana tiene nuevamente la necesidad  de invertir en su negocio de ropa típica, pues la competencia cada vez es más fuerte y ella necesita modernizar y satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes es por ello que solicita un nuevo préstamo. Sebastiana tiene las esperanzas  de seguir mejorando su negocio como también remodelar su casa.
texts.en:
Sebastiana (the first person on the right in the photo) is a woman worthy of admiration because she works hard in order for her family to have what they need. She now has the satisfaction of having been able to improve the condition of her home and she was sable to achieve this with a loan. Without the loan, it would be in the same conditions so she is profoundly grateful to the Kiva lenders for their willingness to change lives.

Sebastiana now needs to reinvest again in her business selling traditional clothing as competition is ever stronger and she needs to modernize and better satisfy her customers' needs. She is therefore requesting an additional loan. Sebastiana hopes to continue improving her business and to remodel her home.

loans.use: to buy and resell typical clothing from the region.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy layer chicks, traditional chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 51-year-old widowed Palestinian mother of one child who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. She started, twenty five years ago, selling fruits and vegetables to cover the needs and expenses of her child for she is his only breadwinner. She is a hard worker and a sacrificing mother who is trying desperately to develop her business and is depriving herself for the sake of her one and only child.

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her son's wedding expenses. This loan will help her prepare a special wedding day for her son which will exceed his expectations.
Maha hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and stay the main supportive for her son.

loans.use: to pay her son's wedding expenses. She lives in a refugee camp

loans.name: Serengeti Group

texts.en:
Felix who is in his early 40's is a married with three kids who are still at school. He has been running a spare parts shop for eight years now. He works from 7am to 9pm daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Felix 7th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increasing on spare part and has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan and appreciate Kiva for the support of their group. He used the profit to pay school fees,loan repayment,built his house,bought a TV set, a Radio and motorcycle and covered household expenses.

He will use this loan to increase on the fast moving spares and meet his customer's request. He dreams of building houses to rent.

Felix will share this loan with his loan group Serengeti which consists of four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase on the fast moving spares and meet his customer's request.

loans.name: Lilia Teodora

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Lidia, tiene 72 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun  viven en su casa pero de forma independientes. Su esposo es fotógrafo.
Doña Lidia es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y así poder ayudar a su marido con los gastos de su hogar vende ropa de todo tipo, ella recorre la ciudad donde tiene sus clientes frecuentes, en su casa también vende su mercadería la misma que deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, allí también ella realiza recargas telefónicas de varias operadoras con lo cual se gana algo extra, lleva más de diez años con este negocio el cual le deja lo necesario para apoyar a su marido ya que los gastos son muchos. 
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisas, ropa de niños y recargas telefónicas. Esta desde el inicio en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar su negocio. Sus sueños son tener buena salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Crédito San Mateo group gets together twice a month in the beautiful seaside resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta known for its beautiful beaches that are visited throughout the year by domestic and foreign tourists. Most of the people in this place engage in fishing or work to do with fishing.

Lilia lives here. She is 72 years old. She is married and they have three adult children. One of them still lives in their home but in an independent way. Her husband is a photographer.

Lilia is a housewife who obtains her own resources to help her husband with the household expenses by selling all types of clothing. She covers the area where she has many frequent customers. She also sells merchandise in her home, selling on credit and collecting every week. She also recharges telephones of various operators there so that she earns a bit extra. She has been in this business for more than ten years which lets her help her husband as the expenses are many.

This loan is to buy pants, blouses, shirts, children’s clothing, and telephone recharges. She has been in the Grupo de Crédito since the start and she likes it because the loans permit her to finance her business. Her dream is to have good health so she can continue moving ahead.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, children’s clothing, and telephone recharges.

loans.name: Ingrid Mariuxi

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Ingrid, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 7 y 3  años  de edad, la mayor estudia en escuela.  El esposo se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Ingrid con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder ayudar con los gastos de los estudios de sus hijos  desde hace mas de 7  años se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de  Yanbal, Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, ella siempre aprovecha los productos de oferta ya que compra bastante y luego vende al precio real lo cual le deja buenos ingresos.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, cremas, perfumes, entre otros. Lleva 5 ciclos  en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos surte su negocio. Sus sueños es darles la mejor educación a sus pequeños.
texts.en: The San Mateo Credit Group meets fortnightly in the beautiful coastal town of San Mateo near the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches which are very popular all year round with tourists from at home and abroad. Most of the locals work in fishing or other sea-related jobs. The town is home to 24-year-old Ingrid, who is married with two children of 7 and 3, the older one of whom goes to school. Her husband is a fisherman. Wanting to earn her own income and be able to help with the cost of her children's education, she has been selling clothing and Yanbal and Belcorps products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women's accessories) for more than 7 years. She does this door-to-door, during her free time,and also sells her goods from her home to the clients she knows best. She leaves her goods on credit and collects payments weekly. She always takes advantage of special offers as she buys quite big quantities and then she sells her goods at the normal price, which earns her a good income. She will use this loan to buy clothing, shoes, creams and perfume, among other things. This is her 5th loan cycle with the Credit group which she likes because the loans enable her to buy stock for her business. Her dream is giver her children the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, creams, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a married woman and she has 3 children.

She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, bread, toothpaste, soap, rice, and flour. Tabitha has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital.

Tabitha will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items. Her business goal is to have a supermarket within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will be successful. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items.

loans.name: Gissella Narcisa

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Gissella, tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijas de 5 y 4 años de edad, ambas estudian en escuela, ella vive en casa de los padres que la apoyan en el cuidado de sus pequeñas.
Doña Gissella es una mujer que le siempre le ha gustado trabajar y así lograr sus propios recursos para que no le falte lo necesario a sus hijas en su diario vivir y en sus estudios lo cual le da muchos gastos, para esto ella se dedica al comercio, vende  ropa de todo tipo, zapatos por catalogo, entre otras cosas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale tres o cuatro  días a la semana en sus recorridos y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos. Tiene más de 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana el sustento para ella y sus hijas.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas, zapatos, entre otras cosas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 3 años  y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella financia su  negocio el cual le permite salir adelante. Sus sueños es darles la mejor educación  a sus hijas.
texts.en:
The San Mateo communal bank meets every 15 days in the beautiful seaside community of San Mateo in the city of Manta. This area is known for its beautiful beaches that are frequented throughout the year by both domestic and foreign tourists. Most of the residents in this place are devoted to fishing or other jobs related to the sea.

Gissella, age 28, lives here. She is the single mother of two daughters, ages five and four. Both of them go to school. She lives in her parents house, and they help her care for her two little ones.

Gissella is a woman who has always liked to work. This way she manages to get her own resources so that her daughters do not lack the necessities in their lives or in their studies, which incur a lot of expenses. In order to do this, she sells all types of clothes and shoes by catalog, among other things. She sells door to door. She goes out three or four days a week on her rounds. She also sells at her house, where her well-known customers come. She has been engaged in this business activity for over four years. This is the way she earns a living for herself and her daughters.

This loan is to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and shoes, among other things. She has been in her communal bank for three years. She likes it because, thanks to the loans, she finances her business, which allows her to get ahead.

Her dream is to give her daughters the best education.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and shoes, etc.

loans.name: Vahagn

texts.en:
Vahagn is 41 years old and he lives with his wife, two children and his mother in Ddmashen village of Gegharkunik region. Vahagn works as a truck driver at different organizations. Simultaneously Vahagh always has been engaged in farming and agricultural works. Now in his farm he has cows, a calf, a bull, a pig and chickens. On his plot of land this farmer cultivates very good sort of potatoes, tomatoes and cucumbers. These vegetables and his farm products (milk, meat, eggs and cheese) Vahagn sells by the help of his mother at the city’s wholesale market.

In order to develop his farming, that is to sell more meat which is very profitable activity. He asks this Kiva loan in an amount of 700.000 Armenian drams as he wants to buy a calf and also fodder for all his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy a calf and also fodder for all his farm cattle

loans.name: Narin

texts.en:
A single man whose name is Narin, 23, is a university student living in Steung Meanchey district of Phnom Penh city. Recently, Narin works as an intern to get salary for supporting on his studying and improve his skill as well. He has been involved with this work for many months.

For Narin, this is his first loan cycle with VisionFund and he will use his entire loan to spend on preparing some necessary documents for his nine-month training abroad such as passport, visas etc. He hopes to get a good experience and skill from this vocational training.

loans.use: to spend on preparing some necessary documents such as passport, visas etc. for his nine-month  training abroad

loans.name: Nasari

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Nasari, who is a 54-year-old married woman. Nasari and her husband have been chicken breeders for five years. She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build a toilet and water sources but Nasari will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all lenders.

loans.use: to improve access to sanitation and clean water at their home by building a toilet and water sources for their family.

loans.name: Cahid

texts.en:
Cahid is 24 years old single gardener. He is a refugee and lives with his parents in IDP settlement. The main source of income for family is raising and selling seasonal vegetables (cucumber, onion, greens and etc.). This brings him 180ZN monthly but he also gets additional earning working as a laborer at his free time. Raising vegetables is very popular in Azerbaijan because people have high demand for fresh vegetables. They use these products to prepare delicious fresh salads and national dishes.

Cahid’s parents are old and they need a good care but this isn’t possible with a small income. So Cahid wants to increase productivity, income and provide his parents good life, because it’s very hard for refugees to pay for medicines. He applied for 1200AZN in order to buy new good fertilizers and garden tools.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to increase his agricultural output and be able to pay for medicines for his elderly parents.

loans.name: Ramil

texts.en:
Ramil is 36-year-old married man and he has two children. He is a refugee as are all his family. They live in an IDP settlement. He earns money for his family by raising animals and selling their meat and wool at local bazaar. He has been working in this area for 10 years and his monthly income is 220 AZN.

Azerbaijan people have been raising sheep and selling their wool from ancient times. They use their wool for fabricating war jackets, blankets, gloves, etc. These thing made from sheep wool are very warm and soft. Sheep meat is used to cook such delicious dishes as kebab. People like eating kebab on holidays and at parties.

Ramil wants to expand his business. Though husbandry is a good source of income, unfortunately, his income is too low to cover life demands on his family. He applied for a loan of 1,200 AZN in order to buy additional livestock (cows). He plans to produce and sell milk and dairy products. Let’s help Ramil to reach his aim.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock (cows) in order to produce and sell milk.

loans.name: Venus

texts.en:
Venus is 42 years of age. She and her family, with five children ages three to eighteen, live in Trinidad, Bohol. She relies on farming rice and raising hogs to earn a living.

Venus is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and piglets to expand her business. Venus works hard in spite of the four months that she has to wait so she can earn income for her children. Venus hopes that her business will become sustainable and profitable.

loans.use: to  buy fertilizer and piglets.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, está trabajando  y está cursando el Segundo año   de la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial. 
Es una persona que lucha para poder ser un profesional, y por medio de sus estudios poder abrirse camino para ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y aranceles de sus exámenes, para que de esa forma pueda continuar con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Carlos is from the city of Curuguaty. He is working and currently in his second year of study toward a degree in Commercial Engineering. Carlos is an individual who is striving to become a professional. Through his studies, he wants to open doors in order to make something of his life.

He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his degree and examination fees. This will allow him to continue his studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay his degree and examination fees.

loans.name: Francisca Paula

texts.es:
Francisca es una  mujer de cuarenta y tres años de edad, empoderada y trabajadora. Además no descuida su papel de madre de dos adolescentes y de esposa. Ella posee un negocio de pulpería, el cual inicio junto a su esposo hace veinte y un años, como una forma de mantener su hogar estable.
Ella confía fielmente en Kiva y MiCrédito, por eso solicita un préstamo para surtirse de productos y comprar ropa variada, refrescos y jugos enlatados, granos básicos, sopas instantáneas, comida enlatada, jabones, papel higiénico, entre otros. En un futuro Francisca planea ampliar y mejorar su vivienda, además de incursionar en otros negocios.
texts.en:
Francisca, age 43, is an empowered and hard-working woman. She also does not neglect her role as wife and mother of two adolescents. She has a grocery store business, which she stated with her husband 21 years ago. She did this as a way of keeping her household stable.

She loyally trusts Kiva and MiCrédito. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to stock up on products and to buy varied clothes, soft drinks, canned juices, basic grains, instant soups, canned food, soap, and toilet paper, among others.

In the future Francisca plans to expand and improve her house in addition to becoming involved in other businesses.

loans.use: to buy varied clothes, soft drinks, canned juices, basic grains, instant soup, canned food, soap, and toilet paper, among others.

loans.name: Ban

texts.en:
Ban works as a commune president of agriculture at Koh Trong village, living with wife and a child. Working as government officer, Ban needs to spend night time to finish his paper work. He needs long lasting energy, but does not have electricity. However, the car battery is not reliable. Sometime the battery runs out without notice. He has no choice but to stay in pitch black until morning, which disturbs not only his living lifestyle but also his business.

Therefore, he is applying for a Kiva loan to buy solar home systems to support his business’s energy usage and also his family usage.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system

location.town: Koh Trong Village, Koh Trong Commune, Kratie Distr

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografia pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de materiales de construccion para poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
The young man whose face is pixelated is 29 years old and lives in a high-risk area. He has been working as a small-scale fisherman for several years. With the income he generates from his sales, he is able to cover some of his household expenses. The young man lives in his own home along with his wife and two children.

He wants to improve his home by building a room in the place that is shown in the photograph. However, he does not have sufficient capital and is requesting a loan in order to buy construction materials for this home improvement.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to build a room.

loans.name: Rosa Heroina

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 56 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de sus hijos vive con ella aunque el ya está comprometido.
Doña Rosa es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y ganar sus propios recursos por el bien de su familia, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad,  legumbres, verduras, frutas, carnes, agua en bidón, colas,  entre otros víveres, allí ella pasa todos el día brindando la mejor atención y al mismo tiempo entreteniéndose con las personas que a diario visitan su negocio, lleva más de 2 años con su negocio el cual le deja lo necesario para salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar víveres que le hacen falta para surtir su tienda. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son muy buenos. Sus sueños son seguir mejorado su tienda.
texts.en:
The San Mateo Credit Group meets fortnightly in the beautiful coastal town of San Mateo near the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches which are very popular all year round with tourists from at home and abroad. Most of the locals work in fishing or other sea-related jobs. The town is home to 56-year-old Rosa, who is a single mother of three grown-up children. Rosa is a woman who likes to fend for herself and earn her own income with which to support her family. She runs a grocery shop in her home, selling all kinds of necessities: vegetables, fruit, meat, containers of water, cola drinks and various other grocery items. She works all day, providing the best possible service for her customers and, at the same time, passing the time with the people who visit her shop each day.
She has been running her shop for more than 2 years and it earns her what she needs to get by. She will use this loan to buy the groceries she needs to increase her shop's stock. She has been a member of the Credit Group since it was founded and she likes it because the loans are very good. Her dream is to continue improving her shop.

loans.use: to buy food.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be creative. She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, bread, toothpaste, soap, rice, flour, tomatoes and potatoes. She has been involved in this business for three years.

Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. She will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items. Her business goal is to have a bigger retail shop within five years.

This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The prrevious loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, salt, rice and other items.

loans.name: Mujeres Del Futuro Pahaj Central Group

texts.es:
Mirla es una mujer de 28 años de edad, es casada con una linda familia de un hijo de cinco años de edad, esta querida familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Mirla (la primera del lado izquierdo de la foto) para darle lo mejor a su hijo y que no le haga falta nada, es comerciante desde hace dos años, vendiendo pizza en la orilla de la carretera que conduce hacia el centro de su comunidad, y para obtener otros ingresos ayuda a su esposo quien es sastre elaborando pantalones de material de lona. Con el afán de mejorar su calidad de servicio hacia los consumidores Mirla ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para la inversión en su negocio de pizza comprando materiales como: harina, jamón, royal y huevos para darle a los clientes deliciosos pizza. Su gran sueño es que sus hijos tengan educación para que ellos cuenten con un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Mirla, age 28, is married and has a lovely family with a five year old son. This beloved family lives in a community in Sololá. Mirla (the first one on the left in the photo) has been a merchant for two years in order to give the best to her son and so that he lacks for nothing. She sells pizza alongside the road that goes to the center of her community. She also does this to get other earnings to help her husband, who is a tailor making canvas pants.

Out of the desire to improve the quality of service to her customers, Mirla has made the decision to request a loan. She will use the loan to invest in her pizza business by purchasing things like flour, ham, baking powder, and eggs to make delicious pizzas for her customers.

Her big dream is for her children to get an education so that they will have a better future.

loans.use: to buy flour, ham, baking powder, and eggs to make pizza.

loans.name: Grupo Pajoca 3 Group

texts.es:
Magdalena  (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa rosada) es una gran mujer de 27 años de edad, soltera con una linda familia con el que vive desde hace varios años, Magdalena cuenta que está muy contenta con su préstamo pues ella pudo brindarle a su cultivo de banano su mantenimiento necesario y a Dios gracias logro una muy buena cosecha y con sus ganancias pudo comprar una refrigeradora  para conservar sus alimentos.  Magdalena antes solo cultivaba banano ahora ya se dedica a la producción de café y durante este tiempo el cultivo de café ya necesita de su mantenimiento y su mayor dificultad es no tener el dinero necesario para cubrir esta necesidad por esa razón solicita un préstamo.
Su gran esperanza es contar con el crédito para lograr una buena cosecha de café pero también anhela instalar un negocio.
texts.en: 27-year-old Magdalena (first on the left on the photo and wearing a pink blouse)is single and has a lovely family with whom she has lived for a number of years. She says that she is very happy with the loan because it enabled her to maintain her banana crop adequately and, with God's help, she had a good harvest. With the earnings, she was able to buy a fridge for storing her food. Previously, Magdalena only produced bananas but she now grows coffee and her crops are currently in need of maintenance. Her main problem is that she does not have the money needed to do this and so that is why she is seeking a loan. Her great hope is to obtain this loan so she can have a good coffee harvest. She also dreams of setting up a shop.

loans.use: to maintain her coffee crop.

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr: La femme qui est à droite tenant dans sa main la corde au mouton est Djitjio. Djitjio est une malienne âgée de 41 ans mère de 07 enfants dont 03 sont scolarisés, elle est analphabète et son conjoint est un  cultivateur, elle rêve toujours d’avoir une maison en dure et de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Elle fait cette activité depuis 03 ans. Pour accroitre une meilleurs rentabilité dans l’élevage de ses moutons et d’augmenter son niveau de revenu, elle a eu quelques problèmes dans la bonne marche de l’élevage de son bétail raison pour laquelle elle a fait une demande de financement auprès  de l’IMF envie d’acheter plus de moutons et d’aliments bétail. Elle achète les moutons dans les foires rurales et après avoir fini de les entretenir elle les vend dans les mêmes foires tout en réalisant un bénéfice qui se varie entre 50000 à 100000f CFA. Avec ce bénéfice elle réalise beaucoup de choses dans sa famille (Éducation, santé, habillement).
texts.en:
The woman on the right holding the rope that is around the sheep's neck is Djitjio. She is from Mali, aged 41, and the mother of seven children, of whom three are or have been enrolled in school. Djitjio is illiterate and her husband is a farmer. She always dreams of owning a house made of concrete blocks and of being able to cover all her family's needs.

Djitjio has been in this business for three years. She wishes to increase her profitability from raising sheep and earn more, but she has some problems with running her livestock-raising business, which is why she is asking for a loan from the microfinance institution so as to buy more sheep and fodder for livestock.

Djitjio buys sheep in rural fairs and after having raised them, she sells them at the same fairs, making a profit of between 50,000 and 100,000 f CFA. With this profit, she can do a lot for her family (education, healthcare, clothing.)

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell afterwards.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est femme âgée de 32 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Mariée et mère de trois enfants, Afi est une marchande de céréales torréfiés qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Afi désire ce crédit pour financer son achat de bols de maïs, d’arachide et de farine de manioc en vue de tirer profit et gagner plus de revenus afin de mieux contribuer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Afi is a 32 year old woman living in Tokoin. Married and mother of three children, Afi is a seller of torrefied cereals who gets her purchases twice per month at the market and resells from home and by going around the surrounding neighbourhoods.

Afi would like this loan to finance her purchase of bowls of corn, peanuts and cassava flour in order to make a profit and earn more income so as to better contribute to the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 15 bowls of corn, 7 bowls of peanuts and 7 bowls of cassava flour.

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Eya est une femme mariée âgée de 53 ans qui habite à Tokoin. Mère d’un enfant, Eya est une marchande de maïs et de produits alimentaires qu’elle s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile pour gagner des revenus. Pour commander des sacs de maïs, Eya nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Eya is a married 53 year old woman living in Tokoin. Mother of one child, Eya sells corn and food products which she purchases once a month at the market and resells in front of her home to earn an income.

To order bags of corn, Eya needs these funds to finance her purchase and make a good profit margin to be able to help her husband take care of the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy ten bags of corn.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Célibataire et sans enfant, Akossiwa est une femme âgée de 27 ans résidant à Baguida. Akossiwa est une marchande qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché des mèches et tissages et les revendent dans sa boutique à ses clients. Akossiwa nécessite ce crédit pour commander des unités de mèches outrées, de mèches sublimes et des tissages en vue de bien vendre afin de gagner des bénéfices pour pouvoir aider sa famille dans la prise en charge de certains besoins en nourriture et santé.
texts.en:
Single and with no children, Akossiwa is a 27 year old woman living in Baguida. Akossiwa is a trader who gets her purchases once a month at the hair extension and weave market and resells them in her shop to her clients.

Akossiwa needs this loan to order units of "Outrée" brand hair extensions, "Sublime" brand hair extension and weaves in order to make good sells and earn an income to be able to help her family in taking care of certain food and health needs.

loans.use: to buy 25 units of "Outrée" brand hair extensions, 10 units of "Sublime" brand hair extensions, and 10 units of weaves.

loans.name: Grupo Tzamjuyup Sector Escuela 02 Group

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer de 32 años de edad, es soltera con una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 3 meses y cinco años de edad, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Catarina para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, con esta labor lleva ella 5 años de realizarlo, este negocio lo hace desde la plaza de su comunidad. Catarina con el deseo de superarse ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio de ropa típica, esto con el objetivo de satisfacer mejor los gustos de los clientes.  Catarina junto a su grupo tienen las esperanzas de contar con el préstamo para fortalecer sus negocios. Catarina su gran sueño es construir su casa propia para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Catarina is a 32 year old woman. She is single with a beautiful family of two children aged between 3 months and 5 years. This humble family live in a community in Sololá.

To obtain her income and provide for her family, Catarina buys and sells typical clothing. She has been doing this work for 5 years, and works from the local square.

With the desire to better herself, Catarina has made the decision to request a loan to buy goods for her typical clothing business, with the aim of better satisfying her customers' tastes.

Catarina, together with her group, are hoping to rely on the loan to improve their businesses. Catarina's greatest wish is to build her own home for the well being of her family.

loans.use: to buy and sell typical clothing.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre que como muchos buscan superase en la vida, él cuenta que con el apoyo del préstamo logro realizar la remodelación de su casa y ahora cuenta con mejores condiciones, esto le ha dado a él una satisfacción porque logro darle a su familia una mejor comodidad. Francisco con su ánimo de ir superándose poco a poco,  ahora solicita  un préstamo, que lo invertirá  en la compra de materiales de construcción para remodelar de la otra parte de su casa que aún está en malas condiciones. 
Su gran sueño es comprar un terreno donde pueda cultivar maíz para luego venderlos y mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a man, who like many, wants to improve and get ahead in life. He comments that with the support from the loan he was able to remodel his home and now enjoys better conditions. This has given him a big satisfaction because he was able to provide an improved comfort for his family.
Francisco, through his will to steadily improving upon himself, is requesting a new loan. He will invest it in the purchase of construction materials to remodel the other part of his home which is still in poor condition. His big dream is to purchase land where he can grow corn which he would then sell and improve his economic income.

loans.use: purchase construction materials to remodel his home

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea está estudiando la carrera de Fisioterapia, vive con sus padres, viene de una familia humilde y sacrificada.
Ella comenta que por medio de sus estudios quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas y de esa forma también poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Andrea is studying for a degree in Physiotherapy. She lives with her parents and comes from a humble and self-sacrificing family. Andrea says that through her studies, she wants to be able to help other people, as well as her family.

She is requesting this loan in order to cover her degree fees. This will allow her to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives with her five children and husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is the guardian of her family, and he has been running his own computer shop for the past 15 years.

Musarat's husband wants to purchase different types of computer accessories for his business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore, Musarat has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan she’ll enable her husband to purchase relevant items for his business purpose so that he can earn more income to manage his business and the household.

Musarat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase different types of computer accessories.

loans.name: Hélène  Ayawa

texts.fr: Hélène est âgée de 41 ans et est une femme mariée. Hélène vit avec ses trois enfants et son mari à Adidogomé où elle prépare de la bouillie faite à base du maïs et accompagner des gâteaux pour ses consommateurs qui trouvent satisfaction dans son activité. Hélène s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et désire commander des bols de maïs et des sacs de la farine de blé afin de gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour ainsi promouvoir l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Hélène is 41 years old and is a married woman. She lives with her three children and her husband in Adidogomé where she prepares mash made from corn and accompanied with cakes for her consumers who find satisfaction in her activity.

Hélène gets her supplies once a month at the market and wishes to order bowls of corn and bags of wheat flour in order to earn a good profit margin to thus promote her children's school education.

loans.use: to buy 90 bowls of corn and 2 bags of wheat flour.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de cinq enfants, Adjo est une femme résidante à Adidogomé. Agée de 30 ans, Adjo est une revendeuse d’oignons et autres condiments qui s’approvisionnent deux fois par mois au marché et le revend en circulant dans les quartiers  environnant. Adjo désire ce crédit pour commander le sac d’oignons en vue de bien vendre et de gagner des bénéfices afin de venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Married and the mother of five children, Adjo is a woman living in Adidogomé. Aged 30 years old, Adjo resells onions and other condiments and gets her supplies twice a month at the market, and resells by travelling through the surrounding neighbourhoods.

Adjo would like this loan to order a bag of onions in order to make good sales and earn profits so as to assist with her children's school education.

loans.use: to buy one bag of onions.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano con 58 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, departamento de lambayeque, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad en su mayoría se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Mariano se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de arroz desde hace 20 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor.Solicita préstamo para la compra de abonos y plaguicidas para su cultivo de arroz, pago de peones para la instalación de su cultivo de arroz.

Socio recurrente en Edpyme Alternativa ,a manejado 03 créditos los cuáles lo a cancelado con puntualidad.
texts.en:
Mariano is 58 years old and lives with his wife and children. They reside in the District of Pucará in Jaén Province, Department of Lambayeque, in the country of Peru. Most of the residents in this area engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding.

Mariano is a farmer who has been cultivating rice for 20 years. His wife helps him with the work. He is requesting a loan in order to buy compost and pest controls for his rice crop. Mariano will also pay the workers who will be planting the rice.

Mariano is a returning client of Edpyme Alternativa and has managed three loans that were repaid on time.

loans.use: to buy compost and pest controls for his rice crop, as well as pay the workers who will be planting the rice.

loans.name: Nellys Mercedes

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Nellys, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 22, 18 y 14 años  de edad, todos aun viven con ella, los dos  menores estudian en colegio.  El esposo es empresario de  la pesca. 
Doña Nellys es una mujer que le gusta generar sus propios ingresos y al igual que su marido ella ha logrado con el paso del tiempo obtener dos embarcaciones, las mismas que al igual que su marido contrata personal para que salgan a las  faenas de pesca, con ella trabajan 6 personas a las cuales les paga un sueldo por su labor, ellos salen en la mañana y regresan después de tres días con los productos que le mar les da, una vez en la playa, ella se encarga de vender a comerciantes o lleva a entregar a las grandes empresas en Manta. Llevan más de 20  años  con este negocio el cual le permite generar sus ingresos y ser fuente de ingresos para las personas que trabajan con ella.
Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustibles, alimentos y otras cosas necesarias para la pesca. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda y los créditos adicionales que le brinda la institución. Sus sueños son tener un gran barco para realizar sus faenas de pesca.
texts.en:
The Crédito San Mateo group gets together twice a month in the beautiful seaside resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta known for its beautiful beaches that are visited throughout the year by domestic and foreign tourists. Most of the people in this place engage in fishing or work to do with fishing.

Nellys lives here. She is 52 years old. She is married and she has three children 22, 18, and 14 years old. All of them still live with her. The two younger ones are studying in school. Her husband is in the fishing business.

Nellys is a woman who likes to earn her own income as her husband does and she has managed over time to obtain two boats. Like her husband she hires staff for fishing operations. Six people work with her and they are paid a salary for their work. They leave in the morning and return after three days with the catch the sea gives them. Once on the beach, she is in charge of selling to merchants or she makes deliveries to the large businesses in Manta. She has been in this business for more than 20 years which permits her to generate earnings and be a source of income for the people that work with her.

This loan is to buy nets, ropes, fuel, food and other things necessary for fishing. She has been with the De Crédito group since the beginning and she likes it for the support and also for the loans the institution provides.

Her dream is to have a large fishing boat.

loans.use: to buy nets, ropes, fuel, food and other things necessary for her fishing business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 27 años de edad, es soltero con una linda familia, por el que se esmera y sacrifica día con día. Juan como muchas de las personas  que han tenido la oportunidad de tener acceso a los créditos sus vidas sean visto muy beneficiadas, él cuenta que con el crédito puedo realizar la ampliación de su negocio de barbería y pudo atender a más clientes.  Juan nuevamente tiene la necesidad de un crédito pero en esta ocasión invertirlo en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de jaspeado para cortes  el comprara: tintes de diferentes colores e hilos. Con esta inversión el espera satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Su esperanza de vida es contar nuevamente con el crédito para que pueda mejorar su calidad de servicio y contar con su propia casa.
texts.en:
Juan is a 27 year old man, he is single with a beautiful family, for whom he works hard and makes sacrifices every day.

For Juan, like many of those who have had the opportunity for a loan, it has been very beneficial in his life. He says that with the loan he has been able to expand his barber shop and attend to more customers.

Juan is again in need of a loan, this time to buy materials for making marbled threads used to weave traditional skirts.

He will buy different colored dyes and threads. With this investment he hopes to better satisfy the needs of his customers. His aim in life is to use the loan again to improve the quality of his service and to have his own home.

loans.use: to buy dyes and threads for making marbled threads used to weave traditional skirts.

loans.name: Miguel Ramos

texts.es: Miguel  es un joven de 23 años de edad, es casado vive junto a su esposa y padres en una comunidad denominada Aldea guiniales. Miguel es de los pocos jóvenes que se esmeran para lograr sus objetivos y aunque aun no cuente con hijos se preocupa para que cuando los tenga cuenten con un mejor futuro y para lograrlo trabaja como piloto de moto taxi, con esta labor lleva el apenas 9 meses. Ahora su objetivo es conseguir un lugar donde algún día pueda construir su casa, por esa razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de su terreno. Su gran sueño es contar con su propia casa para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en:
Miguel is a young man. He is 23 years old, married, and lives with his wife and parents in a community called Aldea Guineales. Miguel is one of the few young men that work hard to achieve their goals, and despite not having children, he wants to give them a better future when they come.

This is why he works as a moto taxi driver. He has been doing this for only nine months. His goal now is to find a place where he can build his house. This is why he is requesting a loan to buy a piece of land. His big dream is to own a house so that his family can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land to build his house.

loans.name: Nhc Tazara Group

texts.en:
Ashura who is in her late 40's is a divorced with two children,one of them is in school and the other one is grown up. She has been selling charcoal for nine years now. She works from 06am to 08pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Ashura's 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to resale. She dreams of have her own permit of cut carbon.

Ashura will share this loan with her loan group NHC which consists of five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal  to resale.

loans.name: Proeurng

texts.en:
Proeurng, 59, is a married man residing in Kandal province. He has five children, three of whom are dependent on him. He earns a living through growing rice and driving a three-wheel motorcycle; he has been involved in his farming business for 36 years. Getting low output is the main challenge to him.

This will be the fifth time for Proeurng with VisionFund. Past loans have enabled him to build a new house for his children and upgrade the standard of living. He will use his loan to buy organic fertilizer in order to improve the farmland. He hopes to increase more yields so as to sustain family’s living and expand his farming business.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to improve his farmland in order to better support the family needs and expand farming business.

loans.name: Manana

texts.en:
Manana, who is 65 years old, is from Tkibuli district. She lives with her pensioner husband and helps the family in its agricultural business.

Manana requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for expanding her agribusiness but without any success. Her loan request was rejected each time because the creditors did not find the existing family income to be sufficient to approve the loan.

The only source of income for the family is a small-scale family agricultural business. They grow nuts on a family-owned plot of land and also have a pig. The monthly income of the family is 500 GEL. According to Credo's estimations, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category.

Manana's loan request was approved in the framework of a joint initiative by Kiva and Credo. The startup loan program for the country's rural poor provides credits for business startups and re-startups with soft conditions. They are regarded as "high risk borrowers" because of their low income and do not have access to credit products. With the received credit, Manana will purchase cattle, raise them and start trading milk-products.

The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva startup loan, will significantly increase the family's income and the family members will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and expand her agribusiness.

loans.name: Maxim

texts.en:
Maxim is married with five children. She lives in Bundibugyo Uganda. Three of her children attend school and she also takes care of two dependents in the family. She deals in buying and selling cocoa as her major source of income and gets additional income from growing and selling cocoa.

She started her business 20 years ago and works 12 hours a day to raise income and school fees in spite of the challenges like competition and weather, which affect her sales and profitability.

She would like to educate her children to university as a family goal and her business hope in future is to become a prominent cocoa trader in the area. Maxim is requesting for a loan to enable her pay for labour on her cocoa garden.

loans.use: to pay for labour in her cocoa garden.

loans.name: Los Positos Group

texts.en:
Friendship Bridge serves over 22,000 impoverished women in Guatemala so that they can find their own solutions to poverty. With the “Microcredit Plus” Program of the organization, that combines small loans and education, the women face a brighter future, improving not only their lives but those of their families. KIVA investors play an important role in the program by funding loans for these very deserving women.

The nine women of the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank  “Los Positos” live in Quiche in the Western Highlands of Guatemala. They range in age from 21 to 45, are married and the majority of them have children who are enrolled in school. 

Rosa, who is 24 years old, is the President of the Trust Bank. She is married and has three children who are 3,4 and 6 years of age. She has realized success in her animal husbandry business. Rosa buys and sells chickens, pigs and cows. She also embroiders beautiful traditional textiles. She is requesting a loan to buy two more cows, feed to fatten them up and then hopes to sell them for a good price. 

A Friendship Bridge Facilitator meets with the women at each of their monthly meetings. After transacting business on the loans, the Facilitator shares beneficial information with the ladies using games, pictures and diagrams. There is often a lot of laughter and giggling as they are so excited to be learning new things. 

KIVA investors are highly valued by Rosa and the women in the Trust Bank. With their loans and education, they are poised to step into a brighter future, benefitting themselves, their families and their community in the Western Highlands of Guatemala! Thank you, KIVA investors!

loans.use: to buy two more cows, feed to fatten them up and then hopes to sell them for a good price

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.ru: Кароматулло молодой энергичный парень. Живет вместе со своей семьёй в Вахшском районе. Ему всего 18 лет, однако, несмотря на юный возраст, он два года как занимается починкой мобильных телефонов. Этому ремеслу его научил двоюродный брат. Сейчас от этой работы он имеет неплохой доход. Однако чтобы оплатить за учебу в университете ему не хватает определенной суммы. Кароматулло обратился за Вашей помощью. Он очень надеется, что Вы его поддержите, и он тем самым сможет продолжить свое обучение.
texts.en: Karomatullo is an young and energetic man. He and his family live in the Vakhsh region. He is just 18 year old but, despite his young years, he has been repairing mobile telephones for two years. His cousin taught him this craft. Now he has a decent income from this work. However, he lacks a certain amount to pay for his university tuition. Karomatullo has turned to you for help. He very much hopes that you will support him, and that he will thus be able to continue his education.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition.

loans.name: Arelys Esther

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito San Mateo se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Arelys, tiene 25 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 6 años y de 9 meses el menor, la mayor  estudia en escuela.  El esposo se dedica a  la pesca. 
Doña Arelys es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su trabajo, el tiene una lancha en la cual se dedica a la pesca, el junto a dos personas se van a alta mar  en su pequeña embarcación a realizar sus faenas de pesca, se van por 15 a 20  días a realizar sus labores, ellos andan junto a un barco pesquero al cual le entregan todas las tardes el producto de la pesca del día, una vez transcurrido estos días ellos regresan a sus hogares para así después de varios días regresar a sus faenas en el mar, ya son 10 años que lleva en la pesca aunque gracias a los créditos hace un año compro su propia lancha con la cual se gana el sustento de  su familia. 
Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustible y alimentos para los días que tienen que estar en alta mar. Lleva 5 años en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque gracias a la ayuda de los créditos han podido compra su lancha. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
The San Mateo Credit Group meets every 15 days in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta. Manta is known for his beautiful beaches that are visited year-round by national and foreign tourists. In this place, the majority of inhabitants make a living by fishing and other sea-related work.

Arelys lives in this place. She is 25 years old, married, and from this relationship has two children. Her children are 6 years old and 9 months old. The older is in school. Her husband is a fisherman.

Arelys is a great housewife who gets loans so that her husband can use them in his work. He has a fishing boat. Together, two people go out to the high seas in his small boat to carry out their fishing operations. They go out for 15-20 days to complete their tasks. Every evening, they go next to a fishing boat where they deliver their product from the day's fishing. After these days they return to their homes, but after a few days they return to their fishing operations. He has been engaged in fishing for 10 years, although thanks to the loans, he bought his own boat a year ago. This boat provides support for the family.

This loan is to buy nets, string, fuel, and food for the days that they have to be in the high seas. She has been in the credit group for 5 years, and likes it because thanks to the assistance from the loans, they have been able to buy a boat. Her dreams are to continue improving her life.

loans.use: to buy nets, string, fuel, and food.

loans.name: Fredeswinda

texts.en:
Fredeswinda is 55 years old and has seven children. Fredeswinda is married and has three children who are in school.

Fredeswinda is in the agricultural business raising chickens in the Philippines. Fredeswinda requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Fredeswinda has been raising chickens for 2 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Fredeswinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is 36 years old and being still not married, he lives with his parents in Tsovagyugh of Gegharkunik region. Artak has higher education and for several years working at the private company as an engineer, where very soon thanks to his good knowledge and skills, he became the director of the department.

He mentions he preferred farming to his office work and now his only occupation is farming which he manages by the help of his father (who works as a cook) and mother (she is a nurse). On his farm Artak has cows, a calf, bulls and sheep. He sells from his farm milk, meat (to city butchers) and also macun (national dairy-product).

This Kiva loan of 550.000 Armenian drams Artak plans to use for the purchase of a calf, two sheep and fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to use for the purchase of a calf, two sheep and fodder for his farm cattle also

loans.name: Svetik

texts.en:
Svetik is from Pemzashen village of Shirak region. She lives there with her 7-years-old son, as her husband and two elder sons work as migrant workers in neighbouring countries.
To sustain her family's living, Svetik runs a farm. She keeps 4 cows, 4 sheep and 6 oxen. Near the house where her house is located, Svetik also cultivates wheat, barley, potato and garlic as well as cherry, pear and apple fruit trees.
With her professional skills in farming, Svetik does her best to be useful, to keep the children healthy, and to provide minimum living conditions for her son.

She has applied for this loan to purchase forage to feed the livestock. Lack of access to loan products, bad market conditions, and high costs make for a number of difficulties for people developing their businesses in the Shirak region. Shirak is considered a poor region, where the unemployment rate is very high and living standards are quite low. Svetik's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the underserved population of Shirak region to help them access the market and earn a living.

Despite the bad socioeconomic conditions in the village, Svetik says she wants to stay in her motherland and be an example for all the young families to work and develop their country.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Ararat

texts.en:
Ararat is an experienced farmer living in the Ashotsq village of the Shirak region. He is a father of three children, a 19-year-old daughter and two sons.

Ararat is mostly involved in cattle breeding. He keeps cows, calves, sheep and two piglets. Ararat also organizes cultivation of potatoes in the arable land near his house.

Ararat has applied for this loan to purchase forage for feeding pigs and barley as forage for his cattle.
