This is how she supports her family with a meager income of PHP 5,000 per month. Recently, Cecilia took out a loan to purchase nipa thatch for roofing. She wants to improve her family's living conditions and maintain her membership with the cooperative.

loans.use: to purchase nipa thatch for roofing.

loans.name: Love Fishes, Love Loan - N13Tđông05Qnham Group

texts.en:
Hương is 28 years old and married. She has been operating a food stall, selling fish for seven years. Hương lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her household was recognized by local government as poor. The income from her job is unstable because the amount and the price of fish she can get from the fishermen are affected by weather conditions.

The main hardship that Hương faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell.

In 2011, Hương joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Hương has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the leader of the group, Love Fishes, Love Loan - N13TĐông05QNham, which consists of three members.

In the future, Hương hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell.

loans.name: Sveta

texts.ru: Света, 48 лет, замужем, 3 детей. У нее высшее образование, работает в городском архиве на должности ведущего специалиста. Также занимается сельским хозяйством, у нее есть 10 овец и корова. Света обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для постройки кухни в ее доме. На кредитные средства она приобретет кирпичи, цемент, доски, дверь и окна. Свои доходы Света будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие жилищных условий проживания ее семьи.
texts.en: Sveta is 48 years old, married, and has three children. She has a higher education and works in the town archive in  the role of principal specialist. She also farms: she has ten sheep and a cow. Sveta has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy construction materials to build a kitchen in her house. With the loaned funds she will buy bricks, cement, boards, a door and windows. Sveta will invest her income in the further development of her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, a door, windows etc. to construct a kitchen in her house.

loans.name: Ulfat

texts.ru: Улфат, хозяйственная женщина в возрасте 53 года проживающая в сельской местности. Замужем и имеет двое детей. Хотя у них маленькая семья они живут очень дружно и счастливо. Они вместе с мужем живут почти 32 года душа в душу и растут двух прекрасных, жизнерадостных детишек. Улфат трудолюбивая женщина, занимается скотоводством и очень любит свою работу. Это занятие у них наследственное, она научилась у матери и теперь учит всему свою дочку чтобы она продолжала занимается этим. Муж Улфат работает в России а сын подрабатывает строителем в селе. Сейчас Улфат сильно больна и врачи рекомендовали ей лечь в больницу. Так как сейчас тяжёлые времена её муж не присылает ей деньги а зарплата сына не хватает даже на лекарство. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом и заранее благодарит за поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Ulfat is an economical woman of the age of 53 years. She lives in the countryside. She is married and has two children. Even if they are a small family, they live together in harmony and happiness. She has lived in perfect harmony with her husband for 32 years and are raising two beautiful, happy children.

Ulfat is a hardworking woman, who is engaged in livestock breeding and loves her work very much. She has inherited this work, as she learned it from her mother. She is currently teaching it to her daughter so that she can continue the work. Ulfat's husband works in Russia and her son earns money as a builder in the village.

Currently Ulfat is very sick and the doctor recommended treatment at the hospital. As the current economical environment is tough, her husband did not send her money, and her son's pay is not enough even for medicine. Therefore Ulfat turned to Arvand for a loan and thanks in advance for the support.

loans.use: to get treatment for her illness

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Саодат жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Вместе со своей семьёй Саодат живёт в сельской местности. Саодат занимается дехканством.  Они очень любят своих детей, и стараются обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что они желают видеть образованных детей. Но зарплата, которую они получают, недостаточна для покрытия всех имеющихся нужд в семье. Поэтому вместе с мужем они имеют дополнительный бизнес. 
 В данное время Саодат вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где они живут, чтобы улучшить условия для проживания. Но собственных средств у них недостаточно. Для этого Саодат обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Saodat is a happy and responsible woman. She is married and has three children. Saodat lives in the countryside together with her family. She is a farmer. She and her husband love their children very much and strives to raise them with all their hearts, as they would like to give them a good education. However, the pay they receive is not enough to cover all the needs of the family. Therefore they have an additional business.

Currently Saodat and her husband would like to renovate their home, where they live, in order to improve their living conditions. They money they have is however not enough for this. For this reason Saodat turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan to purchase building materials for renovating her home. She hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase building materials.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes works as a kitchen helper. She cooks and sells chicken and pork "chicharron," a typical dish in South America.

Mercedes is living at her parents' house. She is mother of one kid. Mercedes wants to have her own business; that is why she needs a loan to buy pots, gas, and an oven.

Mercedes is still a teacher but she realized that the food business is better, so she will give her best. She would like to have her own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy pots, gas, and an oven.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy purses and clothing of all kinds, among other things.

loans.name: Solidaridad De Cachimayo Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD DE CACHIMAYO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Bernardina  alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de crianza de  animales menores,  la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia  se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño  que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes entre otros.
Los demás socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the community group Solidaridad de Cachimayo, located in the Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province of the Cusco department.

Bernardina, a member of the Solidaridad de Cachimayo group, includes among her daily activities the business of rasing small animals. She cares for the animals in order to later sell them to the customers who seek her out. Bernardina is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments without fail. She has been working in this way for some time, and her business is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into her work every day.

Bernardina is asking for the loan to buy guinea pigs and other small animals or birds. The other members are appreciative of the loan and promise to make their required payments. The member in the photo which is attached asked permission to arrive late to the meeting for work related reasons.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and other small animals.

loans.name: Gorgonia

texts.en:
Gorgonia is a strong-willed woman who will do anything for her family. She is 55 years old, married and lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

Gorgonia operates a hog raising business which is primarily financed by Paglaum MPC. The business provides her with quarterly income of approximately PHP 3,000 that sufficiently meets the needs of her family. Recently, she took out another loan to buy piglets and bags of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy piglets and bags of animal feed.

loans.name: Dolorosa

texts.en:
Dolorosa is from Sagbayan, Bohol. She has been raising and selling hogs for almost 10 years. She is 64 years old, married, and has seven children with her youngest child 19 years old.

Aside from hog raising, Dolorosa also engages in growing corn. She is struggling to improve her family's living conditions.

Dolorosa decided to take out a loan to buy piglets and pay for labor to plow her corn field. With the loan, she could start to raise more pigs and improve the yield of her farm. In the months to come, she could settle her finances and manage her income wisely.

Dolorosa hopes that she could expand her two sources of income successfully by producing high quality pigs and growing a variety of crops to have stable income in the years to come.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pay for labor to plow her corn field.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru: Госпожа Галина вместе с мужем Петр являются пенсионерами и живут в Сороках. Четыре года назад хотели помочь сына вернуться домой который работал в Ирландии и открыли собственный бизнес. Госпожа Галина на собственные сбережения и на деньги, заработанные сыном за границей арендовала помещение для коров. Они вложили более $ 20 000 в ремонт и благоустройство помещения. На данный момент на ферме Галины поголовье числится 26 дойных коров и 12 рогатых скотов. В этом бизнесе участвуют вся семья, в том числе и сын, вернувшись из-за границы. Для содержание данного скота они арендовали 70г. земли. Ферма нуждается в водоснабжение так как сейчас ферма снабжается водой трактором с цистеином. Эта перевозка воды нуждается в большие месячные затраты. Поэтому она хочет подключиться к водоснабженью. Госпожа Галина нуждается в займе и поэтому обращается за помощь к KIVA. Эти деньги помогут увеличить поголовье скота и создать новые рабочие места.
texts.en: Galina and her husband Pyotr are pensioners and live in Soroca. Four years ago they wanted to help their son, who was working in Ireland, return home and open his own business. Using her own savings and the money earned by her son abroad, Galina rented a place for cows. They invested more than $20,000 in the repair and improvement of this place. At the present time there are 26 dairy cows and 12 horned livestock on Galina's farm. All the family takes part in this business, including the son, having returned from abroad. They have rented 70 hectares of land to support the livestock. The farm needs a water supply since now the farm is supplied with water from a tractor with a cistern. This transporting of water requires large monthly expenditures, and so she wants to connect to a [permanent] water supply. Galina needs a loan and so she has applied for help to Kiva. This money will help her to increase the size of her herd and create new jobs.

loans.use: to connect her farm to a water supply.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.en:
Wilmer is a married man and he is the father of one kid. He works driving a car.

Wilmer needs a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle. He is the owner of the vehicle.

He works hard but he and his family live at his parents' house because that allows Wilmer to save some money, but he would like to move to his own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Kuña Mbarete Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Mbarete está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres. Es de la ciudad de Caacupé, las  15 integrantes del comité realizan muchos esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante junto con sus familias. 
La señora Carmen, una de las integrantes, ayuda al Sostenimiento de su familia con una olería que tiene en su casa, comenta que hace y vende ladrillos, y por medio de este trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
El  fin del préstamo que ella pide es para  comprar leña, arcilla y otros productos para poder seguir con la fabricación y venta de ladrillos, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
This group is called Kuña Mbarete, and they are in cycle number 1 of the women's committee program.  They are from the city of Caacupe.  The 15 committee members have made many efforts in order to get ahead along with their families.

Carmen, one of the members, helps support her family with a brick making operation that she runs out of her home  She says that she makes and sells bricks, and through this work she is able to have the means to help her loved ones.

The purpose of the loan that she is requesting is to purchase wood, clay and other products in order to continue the manufacture and sale of bricks, and thus be able to continue her work as she has done so far.  She is grateful for the opportunity she has received to improve her life.

loans.use: to purchase wood, clay, and other products to continue with the production of bricks.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica, who is in her mid 40's, is a married woman with two children who are still in school. She has been selling fish for five years now. She works from 5 AM to 11 PM daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Monica's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase fish stock, to buy cooking oil, and to buy charcoal for frying fish, and has managed to pay back all her loan successfully.

She used the profit to take care of her family, to pay school fees, to make loan repayment, and to cover household expenses. She will use this loan to increase her business. She dreams of expanding her fish business.

Monica will make sure she pays back her loan within the loan scheduled time.

loans.use: to increase fish stock.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
For over 10 years, Catalina has been running a retail store that meets customers' demand in her local community. The business is doing well and provides adequate income to cover the family's daily expenses.

Catalina was able to send her children in school and successfully repaid her previous loan. Catalina joined GDMPC to have easy access to financial services. She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC to buy more grocery goods to sell.

Catalina is expecting to get higher sales to expand her business and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more grocery goods to sell.
